definition: peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical

pinyin: tian1 dong1 ben3 bing3 er4 tai4 zhi3

definition: peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
peptide chain (chain of amino acids making up protein)

sentences.english: PACAP, Rat pituitary adenylate cyclase activating polypeptide.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠垂体腺苷酸环化酶激活肽。

sentences.english: The main product is Lilly Company's Exenatide.
sentences.chinese: 最主要的产品为礼来公司的艾塞那肽。

sentences.english: The higher the degree of hydrolysis was, the more the small molecular peptides were.
sentences.chinese: 大豆粕水解度越高，其酶解产物中小分子肽数量越多。

sentences.english: Extracts from the bacterium B. brevis contain a peptide with antibiotic properties.
sentences.chinese: 枯草杆菌提取物中含一种具有抗生素性质的肽。

sentences.english: The biology activity and separation of peptides in fermentive ganoderma lucidum were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了发酵灵芝粉中肽类化合物的分离及其生物活性。

sentences.english: A peptide release is also part of the "ileal brake" mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 肽的释放也是“回肠制动”机制的一部分。

sentences.english: Results This dipeptide was confirmed good in quality by physico-chemical determination.
sentences.chinese: 结果合成的双肽经理化检测，质量高。

sentences.english: She did not have the expertise to develop the peptide herself.
sentences.chinese: 她自己没有开发肽的专业技能。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the regulatory effects of bombesin on the activities of disaccharidase in the intestinal mucosal cells in neonatal rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨铃蟾肽对新生兔小肠黏膜双糖酶活性的影响。

sentences.english: Antibodies are purified by protein A and peptide affinity chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 抗体由蛋白A和肽段亲和层析技术纯化。

sentences.english: Copper Peptides. Copper peptides improve the healing of wound.
sentences.chinese: 含铜的肽类物质增强伤口愈合。

sentences.english: The application of milk oligopeptides in probiotics yogurt was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了牛乳低聚肽在益生菌酸奶中的应用。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the content of amino acid in bone peptides of pig.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析猪骨肽中氨基酸的含量。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of octreotide in acute mild pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察奥曲肽治疗急性轻症胰腺炎的疗效。

sentences.english: The peptide, which crosses the blood-brain barrier, was injected into the animals' abdomens .
sentences.chinese: 这种能穿过血管障碍物的肽，被注射到动物的腹腔内。
玉米肽具有抗疲劳作用。

definition: polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)/same as 肽[tai4]
